tārukkha： tārukkha（pu）
တာရုက္ခ（ပု）
[yādicchaka-]
[ယာဒိစ္ဆက-နာမ်]

Tārukkha：One of the most eminent Mahāsāla brahmins，contemporary of theBuddha．

He was present at the assemblies of the brahmins inIcchānangala and inManasākata．

He was the teacher of Bhāradvāja，companion of Vāsettha．SN．，p．115f； SNA．i．372； ii．462； D．i．235； M．ii．202．

tārukkha：တာရုက္ခ（ပု）
[ယာဒိစ္ဆက-နာမ်]
'တာရုက္ခ＂အမည်ရှိသော （ပုဏ္ဏား）။
